title: Relates to service by citation
summary: Provides that a copy of the petition, affidavits, affirmations and exhibits thereto upon which process was issued, shall be served with the citation or other process, except where service is by publication, and except in a proceeding for a voluntary accounting.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2010

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WEPRIN -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Judiciary

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to
         service of a citation

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  306  of  the  surrogate's court procedure act is
    2  amended by adding a new subdivision 5 to read as follows:
    3    5. A COPY OF THE PETITION, AFFIDAVITS, AFFIRMATIONS AND EXHIBITS THER-
    4  ETO UPON WHICH PROCESS WAS ISSUED, SHALL BE SERVED WITH THE CITATION  OR
    5  OTHER PROCESS TO OBTAIN JURISDICTION OF A PARTY, EXCEPT WHERE SERVICE IS
    6  BY PUBLICATION, AND EXCEPT IN A PROCEEDING FOR A VOLUNTARY ACCOUNTING.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05097-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to service of a citation
